# Antek Automation

> AI automation agency based in the UK. We build AI voice agents, chatbots and workflow automation for service businesses.

## Company

- **Name:** Antek Automation
- **Website:** https://www.aiautomationagencyuk.com
- **Main Website:** https://www.antekautomation.com
- **Industry:** AI Automation & Business Process Automation
- **Founded:** 2024
- **Location:** Chantry House, 38 Chantry Way, Andover, Hampshire, SP10 1LZ, UK
- **Email:** hello@antekautomation.com
- **Phone:** +44 (0) 333 038 9960
- **Certification:** Retell AI Gold Partner

## Services

1. **AI Voice Agents** — Phone agents that answer calls, take bookings, and handle customer enquiries with natural conversation 24/7. Built on Retell AI.
2. **AI Chatbots** — Website and WhatsApp chatbots that qualify leads, answer FAQs, and capture enquiries while you're working.
3. **Workflow Automation** — n8n-powered automation connecting your tools, removing repetitive admin, and running in the background.

## Who We Help

- **Tradespeople** — Plumbers, electricians, builders who can't answer the phone mid-job
- **Lawyers & Solicitors** — Small law firms needing automated client intake and appointment booking
- **Dental Practices** — Practices needing automated booking, cancellations, and new patient handling
- **Consultants & Freelancers** — Independent professionals needing lead capture and enquiry handling
